summary: The final installment of The Digital Asset Data and Infrastructure series saw Frank Chaparro sit down with KPMG's Sam Wyner. The two discussed the complexities and challenges in traditional data and infrastructure faced by both large Financial Services organizations and crypto-first organizations.
title: Digital Asset Data and Infrastructure Part III: A Conversation with KPMG's Sam Wyner | Full Webinar
content: The final installment of The Digital Asset Data and Infrastructure series saw Frank Chaparro sit down with KPMG’s Sam Wyner. The two discussed the complexities and challenges in traditional data and infrastructure faced by both large Financial Services organizations and crypto-first organizations.
